title: Ridoy5567
author: Ridoy5567
content: I am opening a new ID for you. Â You hit red trust. Â I do the bounty and now if I beat Red Trust I can't participate in any bounty. Â I'm not running 5 at a time anymore. Â Red Trust killed me so I have to open a new one. Â Why don't you let us work in peace. Â Or you Legendary will use whatever power you see in your hands. Â Why are you taking away our happiness? Â All previous IDs are beating Red trust. Â So I am opening the ID one by one. Â I promise that I will not open a second ID in my life without changing one of my IDs. Â How long will you harass us like this? Â We are also human beings and we have the right to live happily. Â Please let us stay dry. Â thank youRed trust Referreence link :- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5394559.msg61495497#msg61495497

comments.body: Quote from: Ridoy5567 on December 25, 2022, 03:03:58 PMI am opening a new ID for you. Â You hit red trust. Â I do the bounty and now if I beat Red Trust I can't participate in any bounty. Â I'm not running 5 at a time anymore. Â Red Trust killed me so I have to open a new one. Â So I am opening the ID one by one. Â I promise that I will not open a second ID in my life without changing one of my IDs. Â How long will you harass us like this? Â We are also human beings and we have the right to live happily. Â Please let us stay dry. Â thank youHuh. I can tell English is not first language OP, but as far as I can understand you are pleading for your red trust to be removed even though admitting to have several accounts (aka ID's) ?I don't quite understand what you are trying to say. Also, I you should be aware that the chances of your red trust being removed are not good OP and you should not blame it on Legendary users, not all of them have the power to tag you the way @lovesmayfamilis did. You may even get more negative tags because this thread, btw. You should have sent a private message to lovesmay before doing this.Merry Christmas.

comments.author: RapTarX
comments.body: Quote from: Ridoy5567 on December 25, 2022, 03:03:58 PMWe are also human beings and we have the right to live happily.Of course, you have the right but I'm wondering how living with happiness is connected with bitcointalk account. If you are doing bad activities, don't you think you should be punished? You have participated in two local communities which isn't the proper use of the forum unless you know both languages, do you? If you think the forum members are taking away your happiness, have a life outside the forum; why bother accessing the forum & take the hassles? Easy solution.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Ridoy5567 on December 25, 2022, 03:03:58 PMWhy don't you let us work in peace. What you actually meant is "why don't you let us cheat in peace", as that's exactly what you were doing all this time. Quote from: Ridoy5567 on December 25, 2022, 03:03:58 PMHow long will you harass us like this?You will get "harassed" as long as you keep abusing forum rules and since you got caught 5 times already, I guess it will keep happening as you haven't learned anything.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Take a deep breath and write. It is hard to understand your frustration. Clearly, English is not your first language but at least learn some just for the sake of this forum. There are rules to follow if you do not obey them and continue with that attitude, it is better for you to get some tags. Quote from: Ridoy5567 on December 25, 2022, 03:03:58 PMI promise that I will not open a second ID in my life without changing one of my IDs. Why do you want to change your ID? doesn't make any sense to me. Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on December 25, 2022, 02:07:50 PMThe scammer started the fifth account and continues to deceive the forum. He now uses Google Translate on local boards.Using Google Translate.Now, this needs some serious guts to do. You get caught fifth time now.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I think you misunderstand and apparently so is everyone else trying to explain it to you, what you are doing wrong. It is not illegal to have multiple accounts on this forum. You can own 10000 accounts if you wish, although it's pretty ignorant to be that greedy. What is wrong is joining the same bounty with your multiple accounts. That's what is getting you tagged. You can join every single bounty offered by the managers with 1 account. DO YOU UNDERSTAND THAT? You can join with 1 account period. THAT DOESN'T MEAN YOU CAN JOIN EACH BOUNTY ONCE WITH ALL OF YOUR ACCOUNTS. THAT MEANS YOU CAN ONLY JOIN EACH BOUNTY WITH 1 ACCOUNT. That's why I ask, why be greedy? Why not work fair and earn your tokens? You think you're gaining balance and peace in life by being a cheater? To answer your other question. If you are banned you cannot create a new account. Once your new account is found and connected, you will just be tagged again.

comments.author: julerz12

I will be forced to report your complaints to the moderator.Trust ratings are NOT moderated meaning the mods will NOT care about your report even if you beg them to.You're caught red-handed by posting the same telegram ID, no sane person in this forum would do that, only bounty cheaters and alt-account users.I think you're a clear example of how most new bounty hunters act nowadays; you come in this forum without even a single idea as to what the forum's unofficial rules are. You don't even think of searching and reading it, You just go straight into shoving your head deep into the bounty section and would only go outside it if your precious accounts are tagged.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on December 25, 2022, 03:11:28 PMHuh. I can tell English is not first language No kidding, and I bet it's not even his 4th language based on just his first post alone.Â  And OP, that's just one of many reasons why bounty hunters get no respect or sympathy here.Â  You know why sections like Altcoin Discussion are basically unreadable?Â  It's because most of the members posting there have to post in English because they're in a bounty or sig campaign, and many of them end up writing absolute crap.As to your negative trust, stop fucking whining about it.Â  Even your fellow bounty hunters likely won't stick up for you here, and even if they did nothing would sway opinions anyway.Â  You bounty hunters are generally shitposters and rule-breakers and have been polluting bitcointalk for years.Â  Years.
